formattedAddress: 63 St Nicholas Ave, New York, NY 10026, USA
adrFormatAddress: 63 St Nicholas Ave, New York, NY 10026-2917, USA

originalText.text: I've been going to Demetria for over 25 years.  When I started, my hair was so badly damaged that I couldn't run my fingers through it without hair falling out.  She cut my hair to the length of half a pinky finger.   Today my healthy, rich-looking hair is in the middle of my back.  I wouldn't trade Demetria in for anybody.  She really, really loves what she does and care very, very strongly about healthy hair.

text.text: I've been going to Demetria for over 25 years.  When I started, my hair was so badly damaged that I couldn't run my fingers through it without hair falling out.  She cut my hair to the length of half a pinky finger.   Today my healthy, rich-looking hair is in the middle of my back.  I wouldn't trade Demetria in for anybody.  She really, really loves what she does and care very, very strongly about healthy hair.

originalText.text: If you want to nourish and grow a head of healthy hair then this is the place to visit while you are in New York City. Demitria is one of the best at what she does. She is a back to basics type of entrepreneur. You will walk out looking beautiful and feeling relaxed and refreshed. My hair had broken off so badly it looked like it was chopped off. It is now past my shoulders, bouncy, shiny and healthy. Simplicity is key here.
